|tp_firmware=OpenWrt,DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.11.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=password |oui=4C:E6:76 |oui_eth=4C:E6:76 }} [http://www.buffalo-technology.com/products/wireless/wireless-n-nfiniti-dual-band/wzr-hp-ag300h-airstation-nfiniti-wireless-n-dual-band-highpower-gigabit-router/ Product page] OEM Gemtek WRTA-273N (WRTA-273N_V00) The RAM IC used may alternately be a '''Hynix''' H5DU5162ETR-E3C. [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/buffalo/wzr-hp-ag300h On the OpenWrt wiki] ([http://wiki.openwrt.org/jp/toh/buffalo/wzr-hp-ag300h JP])
{{TechInfoDepot|Buffalo_WZR-HP-AG300H}}
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=86839 On the DD-WRT forums]
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Buffalo_WZR-HP-AG300H On the DD-WRT wiki] Per the OpenWrt wiki, the two wireless interfaces have PCI subsystems of 168c:a097 and 168c:a096. [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31521-buffalo-wzr-hp-ag300h-reviewed On SmallNetBuilder]
[http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16833162047 On Newegg] (reviews)
